meanings.definition: A person who makes corrections or improvements to a text.
meanings.sent1: The diligent emendator carefully reviewed the manuscript for errors.
meanings.sent2: The emendator suggested changes to enhance the clarity of the document.
meanings.sent3: The witty emendator joked about fixing the typos in the novel.
meanings.sent4: She was like an emendator of life, always seeking ways to refine and perfect.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated emendator transformed the text into a polished masterpiece.
